description: A young woman Minamoto and Sakaki met while they were studying in Comerica. She originally had level 2 psychokinesis but she is currently a level 7 as a result of an experiment designed to improve esper powers. Another unexpected result of that experiment was the total loss of her memories that reverted her personality to that of a young child. Minamoto was put in charge of rehabilitating her to her former self and the two parted when her rehabilitation was completed. She is currently involved with the Comerica-Japan space program as a pilot.
name: Caroline McGee
